1.content: Analyze complete visual design system and styling
1.details: Extract all CSS classes, color schemes, component styling, charts, data visualizations, responsive design patterns, and visual elements from the codebase

2.content: Document comprehensive user management and permission system
2.details: Analyze user roles, security levels, access controls, internal user management capabilities, and role-based permissions throughout the application

3.content: Extract Stripe integration and billing system details
3.details: Document complete Stripe setup, payment flows, subscription management, membership tiers, billing pages, and financial integrations

4.content: Analyze sales pages and marketing components
4.details: Document landing pages, onboarding flows, marketing content, call-to-action elements, and conversion funnels

5.content: Document all charts, analytics, and data visualization
5.details: Extract specifications for all dashboard charts, metrics displays, data tables, analytics components, and reporting features

6.content: Create enhanced reconstruction guide with all visual and functional details
6.details: Compile all findings into a comprehensive guide that includes every CSS class, color code, permission level, and UI element specification
